1.0.name: wordpress/dynamic-injector
1.0.description:
Inserts custom content into posts at page load time.

This is useful when you want to dynamically display content within your post without actually modifying the post itself.

You can also use special keywords like $categories and $tags to insert realtime meta data about a post into its conent to do interesting things. You can use this in conjunction with shortcodes that other plugins utilize to make your content richer and more dynamic.
